sn46.51:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you what fuels and what starves the five hindrances and the seven awakening factors.
sn46.51:4.4: And what fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:4.5: There is the aspect of beauty.
sn46.51:4.7: fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:5.1: And what fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:5.2: There is the aspect of rigidity.
sn46.51:5.4: fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:6.1: And what fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:6.2: There is dissatisfaction, sloth, yawning, lethargy after eating, and mental sluggishness.
sn46.51:6.4: fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:7.1: And what fuels the arising of restlessness and remorse, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:7.4: fuels the arising of restlessness and remorse, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:8.1: And what fuels the arising of doubt, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:8.2: There are things that are grounds for doubt.
sn46.51:8.4: fuels the arising of doubt, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:9.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection?
sn46.51:9.2: There are things that are grounds for the awakening factor of mindfulness.
sn46.51:9.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection.
sn46.51:10.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection?
sn46.51:10.2: There are qualities that are wholesome and unwholesome, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.
sn46.51:10.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection.
sn46.51:11.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of energy, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection?
sn46.51:11.2: There are the elements of initiative, persistence, and exertion.
sn46.51:11.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of energy, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection.
sn46.51:12.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of rapture, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection?
sn46.51:12.2: There are things that are grounds for the awakening factor of rapture.
sn46.51:12.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of rapture, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection.
sn46.51:13.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of tranquility, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection?
sn46.51:13.2: There is tranquility of the body and of the mind.
sn46.51:13.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of tranquility, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection.
sn46.51:14.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of samādhi, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection?
sn46.51:14.2: There are aspects of things that are serene and free from distraction.
sn46.51:14.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of samādhi, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection.
sn46.51:15.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of equanimity, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection?
sn46.51:15.2: There are things that are grounds for the awakening factor of equanimity.
sn46.51:15.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of equanimity, or, when it has arisen, develops it to perfection.
sn46.51:16.1: And what starves the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, starves its increase and growth?
sn46.51:16.2: There is the aspect of ugliness.
sn46.51:16.4: starves the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, starves its increase and growth.
sn46.51:17.1: And what starves the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, starves its increase and growth?
sn46.51:17.2: There is the heart’s release by love.
